title: Newton's Third Law
questionText: Which of the following best describes Newton's Third Law of Motion?

answers.text: Every action has an equal and opposite reaction.
Objects in motion stay in motion.

title: Specific Impulse
questionText: What is the specific impulse of a rocket engine a measure of?

answers.text: The thrust produced per unit of fuel.
The total fuel consumed during launch.

title: Bernoulli's Principle
questionText: Bernoulli's principle explains which aerodynamic effect?

title: Mach Number
questionText: What does the Mach number represent in aerodynamics?

answers.text: The speed of an object relative to the speed of light.
The speed of an object relative to the speed of sound.
The density of air around an object.

title: Thermal Control
questionText: Which is the primary method for spacecraft thermal control in vacuum?

title: Heat Shields
questionText: What is the main purpose of heat shields in spacecraft?

title: Atomic Bonds
questionText: What type of bond forms between hydrogen and oxygen in water?

title: SN1 Reaction
questionText: What is the rate-determining step of an SN1 reaction?
